mapper.sql: STWD_ID, STWD_LNM, STWD_PNM, ENG_MEAN, CCH_NM, ORG_DS, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, DMN_YN, STND_ASRT
mapper.select: SELECT /* WamStwdMapper.selectListTop30 */ * FROM ( SELECT * FROM WAM_STWD WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY RQST_DTM DESC ) TBL LIMIT 30

SELECT /* WamStwdMapper.selectWordDetail */ A.*, GET_USER_NM(A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM, GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM, GET_USER_NM(A.APRV_USER_ID) AS APRV_USER_NM FROM WAM_STWD A WHERE A.STWD_ID = #{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')

SELECT /* WamStwdMapper.selectStndList */ 'STWD' AS BIZ_DTL_CD ,A.STWD_ID AS STWD_ID ,A.STWD_LNM AS STND_NM ,A.STWD_LNM AS STWD_LNM ,A.STWD_PNM AS STWD_PNM ,A.OBJ_DESCN ,A.RQST_USER_ID ,U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM ,A.STND_ASRT FROM WAM_STWD A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND ( A.STWD_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR A.STWD_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR A.STWD_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') OR A.STWD_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') )
AND A.OBJ_DESCN LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%')
AND 'STWD' = #{bizDtlCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND STND_ASRT = #{stndAsrt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UNION ALL
SELECT 'DMN' AS BIZ_DTL_CD ,D.DMN_ID AS STWD_ID ,D.DMN_LNM AS STND_NM ,D.DMN_LNM AS STWD_LNM ,D.DMN_PNM AS STWD_PNM ,D.OBJ_DESCN ,D.RQST_USER_ID ,U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM ,D.STND_ASRT FROM WAM_DMN D LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON D.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')
AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND ( D.DMN_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR D.DMN_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR D.DMN_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') OR D.DMN_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') )
AND D.OBJ_DESCN LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%')
AND 'DMN' = #{bizDtlCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND STND_ASRT = #{stndAsrt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UNION ALL
SELECT 'SDITM' AS BIZ_DTL_CD ,S.SDITM_ID AS STWD_ID ,S.SDITM_LNM AS STND_NM ,S.SDITM_LNM AS STWD_LNM ,S.SDITM_PNM AS STWD_PNM ,S.OBJ_DESCN ,S.RQST_USER_ID ,U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM ,S.STND_ASRT FROM WAM_SDITM S LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON S.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')
AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND ( S.SDITM_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR S.SDITM_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR S.SDITM_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') OR S.SDITM_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%'))
AND S.OBJ_DESCN LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%')
AND 'SDITM' = #{bizDtlCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND STND_ASRT = #{stndAsrt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY 2,1

SELECT /* WamStwdMapper.selectAltHistoryList */ A.STWD_ID ,A.STWD_LNM AS STWD_LNM ,A.STWD_PNM AS STWD_PNM ,'STWD' AS BIZ_DTL_CD ,A.REG_TYP_CD ,A.STR_DTM ,IFNULL(A.RQST_USER_ID, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) AS FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,U.USER_NM AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM ,A.OBJ_DESCN FROM WAH_STWD A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON IFNULL(A.RQST_USER_ID, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')
AND A.REG_TYP_CD LIKE CASE #{regTypCd} WHEN 'U' THEN 'U' WHEN 'C' THEN 'C' WHEN 'D' THEN 'D' WHEN 'ALL' THEN '%%' END
AND (A.STWD_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR A.STWD_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%'))
AND A.OBJ_DESCN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND 'STWD' = #{bizDtlCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (DATE_FORMAT(A.STR_DTM , '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{searchBgnDe} AND #{searchEndDe})
AND STND_ASRT = #{stndAsrt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UNION ALL
SELECT A.DMN_ID AS STWD_ID ,A.DMN_LNM AS STWD_LNM ,A.DMN_PNM AS STWD_PNM ,'DMN' AS BIZ_DTL_CD ,A.REG_TYP_CD ,A.STR_DTM ,IFNULL(A.RQST_USER_ID, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) AS FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,U.USER_NM AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM ,A.OBJ_DESCN FROM WAH_DMN A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON IFNULL(A.RQST_USER_ID, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')
AND A.REG_TYP_CD LIKE CASE #{regTypCd} WHEN 'U' THEN 'U' WHEN 'C' THEN 'C' WHEN 'D' THEN 'D' WHEN 'ALL' THEN '%%' END
AND (A.DMN_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR A.DMN_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%'))
AND A.OBJ_DESCN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND 'DMN' = #{bizDtlCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (DATE_FORMAT(A.STR_DTM , '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{searchBgnDe} AND #{searchEndDe})
AND STND_ASRT = #{stndAsrt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UNION ALL
SELECT A.SDITM_ID AS STWD_ID ,A.SDITM_LNM AS STWD_LNM ,A.SDITM_PNM AS STWD_PNM ,'SDITM' AS BIZ_DTL_CD ,A.REG_TYP_CD ,A.STR_DTM ,IFNULL(A.RQST_USER_ID, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) AS FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,U.USER_NM AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM ,A.OBJ_DESCN FROM WAH_SDITM A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON IFNULL(A.RQST_USER_ID, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')
AND A.REG_TYP_CD LIKE CASE #{regTypCd} WHEN 'U' THEN 'U' WHEN 'C' THEN 'C' WHEN 'D' THEN 'D' WHEN 'ALL' THEN '%%' END
AND (A.SDITM_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR A.SDITM_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%'))
AND A.OBJ_DESCN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND 'SDITM' = #{bizDtlCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (DATE_FORMAT(A.STR_DTM , '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{searchBgnDe} AND #{searchEndDe})
AND STND_ASRT = #{stndAsrt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY 2,4
mapper.insert: INSERT /* WamStwdMapper.insert */ INTO WAM_STWD ( STWD_ID, STWD_LNM, STWD_PNM, ENG_MEAN, CCH_NM, ORG_DS, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stwdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stwdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{engMean,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cchNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT /* WamStwdMapper.insertSelective */ INTO WAM_STWD
STWD_ID,
STWD_LNM,
STWD_PNM,
ENG_MEAN,
CCH_NM,
ORG_DS,
RQST_NO,
RQST_SNO,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,
DMN_YN,
#{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stwdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stwdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{engMean,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cchNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orgDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
#{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
#{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
#{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dmnYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
UPDATE /* WamStwdMapper.updateByPrimaryKeySelective */ WAM_STWD
STWD_LNM = #{stwdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STWD_PNM = #{stwdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENG_MEAN = #{engMean,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CCH_NM = #{cchNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_DS = #{orgDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_YN= #{dmnYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE STWD_ID = #{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE /* WamStwdMapper.updateByPrimaryKey */ WAM_STWD SET STWD_LNM = #{stwdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STWD_PNM = #{stwdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENG_MEAN = #{engMean,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CCH_NM = #{cchNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_DS = #{orgDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE STWD_ID = #{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* WamStwdMapper.deleteWamStwd */ WAM_STWD WHERE STWD_ID IN ( SELECT STWD_ID FROM WAH_STWD WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') )
mapper.select: /* WamStwdMapper.selectWordChangeList */ SELECT A.* , GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM , CASE WHEN A.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') THEN '#0000FF' ELSE NULL END AS FontColor FROM WAH_STWD A WHERE STWD_ID = #{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY EXP_DTM DESC, STR_DTM DESC

SELECT /* WamStwdMapper.selectByLnmPnm */ * FROM WAM_STWD
( STWD_LNM = #{sbswdLnm} OR STWD_LNM = UPPER(#{sbswdLnm}) ) AND ( STWD_PNM = #{sbswdPnm} OR STWD_PNM = UPPER(#{sbswdPnm}) ) AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')

SELECT /* WamStwdMapper.selectStndWordComparisonList */ A.*, '#0000FF' AS FontColor FROM WAM_STWD A WHERE STWD_ID = #{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT A.*, '#000000' AS FontColor FROM WAM_STWD A WHERE STWD_ID != #{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD B WHERE B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND B.STWD_ID = #{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
